entry.title: ByteDance Seed Helps Tsinghua Win RoboCup Championship
entry.summary: The first championship win for a Chinese team in the Humanoid League AdultSize.

entry.title: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0 Released: An End-to-End Simultaneous Interpretation Model Featuring Ultra-High Accuracy Close to Human Interpreters, Low Latency of 3 Seconds, and Real-Time Voice Cloning
entry.summary: Seed LiveInterpret 2.0 achieves SOTA quality in both Chinese-to-English and English-to-Chinese interpretation with ultra-low latency.

entry.title: ByteDance Seed Prover Achieves Silver Medal Score in IMO 2025
entry.summary: Formalization + Test-time scaling, deep thinking in math reasoning

entry.title: Seed Research￨GR-3 Released: A Generalist Robot Model for Generalization, Long-Horizon Tasks, and Bi-Manual Deformable Object Manipulation
entry.summary: A generalizable robot operation model that supports long-range and complex tasks

entry.title: 4B Model Rivals 235B Performance in Mathematical Reasoning: Seed’s Latest RL Training Recipe Fully Open-Sourced
entry.summary: 700-step RL training significantly enhances mathematical reasoning capabilities in smaller models.

entry.summary: It stands out with Multimodal Hybrid Retrieval, SOTA Performance and Flexibility.

entry.title: Introduction to Techniques Used in Seed1.6
entry.summary: Adaptive Thinking Powered by Multimodal Capabilities (Including college entrance examination Scores)
